commits.commitMessage:
Implement new Legato Clock Service usable via APIs and LWM2M object 33405

This set of patches implements the new Clock Service in Legato, its le_clkSync
APIs, LWM2M object 33405 & AVC code to use these APIs to give AV a means to
update a device's clock time, the Linux interface to update an NTP acquired
time into the system clock, and moves clock related code in DCS into this new
service.

Resolves: LE-12702 LE-11503
Related: LE-13214 LE-12714 LE-13137
Change-Id: I6205ed5be6504105c7cb6c2af026c6f27ee83e76
commits.subject: Implement new Legato Clock Service usable via APIs and LWM2M object 33405
